subject: World Cup 2010 (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: An uncalled hand ball by Thierry Henry last November helped France qualify for the World Cup, so it was a bit rich to see Henry imploring the referee to call a hand ball against Uruguay.
snippet: An uncalled hand ball by Thierry Henry last November helped France qualify for the World Cup, so it was a bit rich to see Henry imploring the referee to call a hand ball against Uruguay.
